definitions.definition: A lightweight, balanced plain-woven sheer fabric, or gauze, like gossamer, woven of alternate S- and Z-twist crepe (high-twist) yarns made of silk, polyester, or cotton.
examples: Her dresses are made from these marvelous chiffons .

definitions.definition: Any purely ornamental accessory on a woman's dress , such as a bunch of ribbon, lace, etc.

main_definition: A lightweight, balanced plain-woven sheer fabric, or gauze, like gossamer, woven of alternate S- and Z-twist crepe (high-twist) yarns made of silk, polyester, or cotton.
secondary_definitions: Any purely ornamental accessory on a woman's dress , such as a bunch of ribbon, lace, etc.
